Description: CloudWatch Dashboards to visualize Route 53 hosted zones and health checks. Both dashboards leverage Dashboard Variables to filter on the desired resources. Dashboard 'Route53_All_Resources' visualizes ALL hosted zones and health checks. Dashboard 'Route53_Individual_Resources' provides additional filters to isolate a specific hosted zone and health check.

DefaultHostedZoneID.Description: Optional. Select the default Route53 Hosted Zone ID to be monitored (e.g. Z1234567ABCDEFG).

DefaultHealthCheckID.Description: Optional. Select the default Route53 Healthcheck ID to be monitored. (e.g. abcedefg-1234-hijk-5678-lmnopqrstuvw)

Properties.DashboardBody:
{
    "widgets": [
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 7,
            "y": 1,
            "width": 17,
            "height": 8,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ { "expression": "REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Route53,HostedZoneId} MetricName=\"DNSQueries\"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))", "label": "${PROP('Dim.HostedZoneId')}", "id": "e1" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "stat": "Average",
                "period": 300,
                "title": "DNSQueries"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "text",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 0,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 1,
            "properties": {
                "markdown": "# Public Hosted Zones"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "metric",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 1,
            "width": 7,
            "height": 8,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ { "expression": "REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Route53,HostedZoneId} MetricName=\"DNSQueries\"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))", "label": "${PROP('Dim.HostedZoneId')}", "id": "e1", "region": "us-east-1" } ]
                ],
                "view": "pie",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "stat": "Average",
                "period": 300,
                "title": "DNSQueries",
                "setPeriodToTimeRange": true
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "text",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 9,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 1,
            "properties": {
                "markdown": "# DNS Security Extensions"
            }
        },
        {
            "type": "text",
            "x": 0,
            "y": 34,
            "width": 24,
            "height": 1,
            "properties": {
                "markdown": "# Health Checks"
            }
        },

            "type": "metric",
            "x": 7,
            "y": 10,
            "width": 17,
            "height": 8,
            "properties": {
                "metrics": [
                    [ { "expression": "REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Route53,HostedZoneId} MetricName=\"DNSSECInternalFailure\"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))", "label": "${PROP('Dim.HostedZoneId')}", "id": "e1", "region": "us-east-1" } ]
                ],
                "view": "timeSeries",
                "stacked": false,
                "region": "us-east-1",
                "stat": "Average",
                "period": 300,
                "title": "DNSSECInternalFailure"
            }
        },
        {

            "x": 0,
            "y": 18,
            "width": 7,
            "height": 8,
            "properties": {

                    [ { "expression": "REMOVE_EMPTY(SORT(SEARCH('{AWS/Route53,HostedZoneId} MetricName=\"DNSSECKeySigningKeysNeedingAction\"', 'Sum', 60), SUM, DESC))", "label": "${PROP('Dim.HostedZoneId')}", "id": "e1", "region": "us-east-1" } ]
                ],

                ],
